string-array.name: workoutDescriptions
string-array.item:
>			One\, 9–Part, Band Workout - developed by Tom Brady's trainer and the team at TB12.

>			This workout is meant to be done 3 - 4 days a week. Each excersise should comprise of 3 sets.

>			Difficulty :	Moderate

>			This workout is used by Lebron to gain muscle mass and weight by lifting heavy and eating right.

>			WORKOUT BASICS:

		–	 Lifting Weights 3x Per Week

		-	Yoga 30 Minutes Per Day

		-	Bodyweight + Plyometric Exercises 5-6x Per Week

>			This workout is used by Connor McGregor - "The Notorious" to keep in shape for power and endurance in the octagon.

>			Some of McGregor's Tips:

		-	 Change up your workout from time to time.

		-	Always Stretch & Get Proper Rest

		-	Practice Bodyweight Exercises - "Machines don't use machines; and I am a machine".
